name: Nightmare Maze
overview: Nightmare Maze is a 1-player arcade game for multiple systems Sleepy Joe must try to collect enough keys to escape the maze. When the player collects a key another one appears on the maze to collect. The player has 60 seconds to collect all 8 keys and make it to the escape door. Enemy monsters bounce around the maze, and the player loses a life and must restart collecting keys if they contact an enemy. If the player drinks a cup of coffee, the player wakes up, and the monsters disappear for a few seconds. The player starts with 5 lives, and gains a new life every 10,000 points.
